name: Lightman
description:
Lightman is a 3D platformer to discover solo.
The player embodies the brave main character Lightman in a sci-fi adventure.
Maneuver with care to recover all the pieces that will allow you to finish the level and move on to the next.
Avoid the turrets that attack you, go through the gates without being killed and be agile.
A code system allows you to restart the level to beat your high score.
